Title: Relates to providing extended speech, physical or occupational therapy under Medicaid
Summary: Allows for speech, physical or occupational therapy under Medicaid beyond twenty visits where the provider of the therapy or services attests to the medical necessity of the additional visits.
LawCode: Amd ยง365-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to providing extended speech, physical or occupational therapy under Medicaid
